attributes.action: Have the government to focus and do more about the global warming crisis
attributes.additional_details:
If the government focuses on these problems, they can find solutions to prevent it. Even if that means all nations around the world to come together to tackle it! Even if that means have the people of each country make a massive contribution to helping prevent global warming before the human race itself become extinct with every other species.
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/world-latin-america-49415973

https://oceanconservancy.org/trash-free-seas/plastics-in-the-ocean/
attributes.background: Recently global warming has became a big concern due to plastic in the oceans, animals becoming endangered/extinct and recently The Amazon rainforest being on fire. Our government should should be focusing more on that! People paid billions for the Notre Dame to be restored why not our planet?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that your concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/266638
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/268785
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245708
